title: The Transformation of Clarice: Unbreakable Clarice

Enduring rough bondage and discipline sessions only made her erotic allure stronger. Master knew she was ready for the next step. Once the transformation had begun, there was no turning back. Clarice had to learn to live in a constant state of arousal. This would become her strongest weapon.
author: Francesca Demont
